channel.title: Prism on Duane Newman
channel.description: Recent content in Prism on Duane Newman

item.title: Using Prism With Xamarin.Forms & GTK
item.description: I’m working on project to replace my car radio with a custom digital dashboard. I’m building it on a RaspberryPi and would really like to use Xamarin.Forms and Prism, so I started out with adding a GTK# frontend to my Xamarin.Forms project. Adding the GTK# Backend Project Before we can add the GTK# project we need to actually install the GTK# libraries. Head over to The Mono Project to download and run the GTK# for .
